Description:
Requirements:The candidate should have a minimum working on 2 end to end Implementation and support in SAP CRM, handling different verticals such as Manufacturing, Real Estate and Construction, IT services, and Other Industries.Skills:Practical knowledge in configuring SAP CRM Transactions. Should have worked in Service module and be well versed with configuring Status profile, Date Profile, Partner Profile, Actions, Categorization Schema, Rule Policy etc. Candidate should know Middleware Monitoring & Configuration, should be able to analyze BDOC Error, Inbound- Outbound queues and resolve it.
Candidate should have good CRM Technical knowledge. Candidate should have knowledge about One Order Framework, standard BAdIâ€™s, should have experience in CRM WebUI, BOL Genil Programming, OData, Rest API, ABAP/4 syntax, AMDP Procedure, CDS Views.
Experience in integration with 3rd party systems, responsible for providing Technical Spec for the developments done, communicating with Business Users to resolve their issues.
Must be proficient in handling support functions. Efficient in solution design, documentation, follow SAP best practices.Skills
